text: Balb/c mice were provided by the Laboratory Animal Center, Harbin Medical University. Newborn mice at the age of 1-3 day after birth were used in this study. Mice were euthanized and cardiomyocytes were prepared as described previously (Ehler et al., 2013; Sherry, 2015) . Cardiomyocytes were cultured overnight in growth medium containing 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS). Cells were then transfected with pEGFP-VP1 or control vector pEGFP-C1 for 24 h. Cell cycle was analyzed by flow cytometry.
